notes: The issue provides no code, no reproduction steps, and no specific error messages — only 'images not appearing'. Created comprehensive tests covering basic image drawing scenarios (DrawBitmap, DrawImage, FromEncodedData, pixel verification). All tests passed on SkiaSharp 2.88.9, 3.116.0, 3.119.2, and main branch, showing images render correctly. Without actual reproduction code from the reporter, cannot determine if there's a real bug or a usage error. Recommend requesting complete reproduction from reporter including actual code, expected vs actual behavior, and platform details.
blockers: No reproduction code provided in issue — only template placeholders
No specific error messages or symptoms beyond 'images not appearing'
Cannot verify reporter's exact scenario without their code

versionResults.notes: All image drawing tests passed. Basic bitmap drawing, image loading from encoded data, and pixel verification all worked correctly.
Reporter's version. All tests passed identically to 2.88.9. Images rendered correctly, pixel data verified.
Latest stable release. All tests passed. No rendering issues detected.
Built and tested main branch. SKImageTest suite passed all 51 tests. Image operations work correctly.

reproductionSteps.description: Create console app with SkiaSharp 3.116.0 (reporter's version)
reproductionSteps.command: dotnet new console -n Repro --framework net8.0 && cd Repro && dotnet add package SkiaSharp --version 3.116.0
reproductionSteps.output: Console app created, SkiaSharp 3.116.0 package added

filesCreated.description: Comprehensive image drawing tests covering DrawBitmap, DrawImage, FromEncodedData, and pixel verification

reproductionSteps.description: Run comprehensive image drawing tests with SkiaSharp 3.116.0
reproductionSteps.output:
=== Test 1: Basic image drawing ===
Drew red bitmap at (50, 50)
Saved to /tmp/test1.png (630 bytes)

=== Test 2: Load from encoded data ===
Created test PNG (160 bytes)
Loaded image: 50x50
Drew loaded image at (75, 75)
Saved to /tmp/test2.png (629 bytes)

=== Test 3: Verify pixel data ===
Center pixel (50,50): #ffff0000
✓ Red square rendered correctly
Corner pixel (10,10): #ffffffff
✓ Background is white as expected

=== All tests complete ===

reproductionSteps.description: Test with SkiaSharp 2.88.9 (reporter's 'last known good' version)
reproductionSteps.command: dotnet remove package SkiaSharp && dotnet add package SkiaSharp --version 2.88.9 && dotnet run
